guest.name: Hila Qu
guest.title: Advisor / Former VP of Growth at GitLab
guest.background: Hila Qu is a renowned growth expert who helped scale GitLab and Acorns. She specializes in establishing Product-Led Growth (PLG) motions within B2B companies and building data-driven growth teams.
guest.background_zh: Hila Qu 是一位知名的增长专家，曾助力 GitLab 和 Acorns 实现规模化增长。她专注于协助 B2B 企业建立产品驱动增长（PLG）体系，并组建数据驱动的增长团队。

episodeSummary: Hila Qu breaks down the tactical steps to transition from a sales-led to a product-led growth model. She covers the essential prerequisites for PLG, how to define and optimize 'Aha Moments', the necessary data infrastructure, and how to structure growth teams for maximum impact.
episodeSummary_zh: Hila Qu 详细拆解了从销售驱动（SLG）向产品驱动增长（PLG）转型的战术步骤。她涵盖了实施 PLG 的核心要素、如何定义和优化“Aha Moment”、必要的数据基建搭建，以及如何构建高效的增长团队架构。
